content:
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of France has condemned the holding of the "presidential elections of the Russian Federation" in the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine.

About thisIt is saidon the Ministry's website.

"France condemns the organization of the so -called elections in the temporarily occupied Ukrainian territories: in the Autonomous Republic of Crimea and the city of Sevastopol, as well as in some districts of Donetsk, Lugansk, Zaporizhia and Kherson regions," - said there.

The ministry emphasized that France does not recognize and never recognizes the results and results of these so -called elections and confirms its commitment to the sovereignty, independence, unity and territorial integrity of Ukraine.

"France condemns the creation of polling stations in the separatist regions of Abkhazia and South Ossetia, as well as in the Transnistrian region of the Republic of Moldova without the consent of the Georgian and Moldovan authorities," the Foreign Ministry reported.

At the same time, the ministry congratulated the courage of many Russian citizens who peacefully demonstrated their disagreement on the election day.

It should be reminded that the so -called elections were held in the Russian Federation, the victory of which was attributed to Vladimir Putin. BeforeThe Armyinform reportedthat more than 50 UN countries have condemned Russian pseudo -elections in the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine.

The head of the UK's defense departmentstatedthat Putin stole another "election", but he will not steal Ukraine. Foreign Minister of Italystatedthat pseudo -elections in Russia are "not free or honest."

In the EUmade a statementAgainst the backdrop of "elections" in Russia, noting that the results are void and are not valid.
title: France does not recognize the holding and results of "elections" of the President of
description: This is stated on the Ministry's website. “France condemns the organization of the so -called elections ...
author: Army Inform
